data.title: A treat for eyes, hands, sewing mind and crafty havens
data.text: A great place to see quilts and talk about quilting one of those essential activities that knit together the women of a community and showed off their many talents and interests.It is amazing what these communities and individual quilters have done in the interest of adding to their home stores.

data.title: Quilt lovers heaven
data.text: Great place for quilt lovers. Great selection of threads needles fabirc and lots of other things needee for quilting.  They are participants of the annual "shop hop" that takes place in spring. They work hard at keeping new items and promotions within the store.

data.title: Quilter's Delight
data.text:
If you are a quilter and are in the area of Tracy you MUST stop in and visit this DELIGHTFUL store. Located in the Historic Downtown Tracy district it's a great location.
At first I thought it was a tiny store until Tony gave me a personal tour. Their fabrics are separated in to rooms (almost like being in a house). It is beautifully organized. Easy to find what you are looking for when you need it. In the back they have a large class room. Tony told me on Friday nights they have a knitting circle meet there as the local knit shop closed. 
Tony was amazingly friendly and wonderfully knowledgeable. I had a great time and bought some fabrics I had never seen before.
Make this a stop on your next quilt run!
